--Deb

messages.subject: Socialization T-shirts now for sale
messages.msgSnippet: This comic was created by Jason Holm, a homeschooling dad, who s trying to start up a new business to support his family. IMPORTANT NOTICE! Due to numerous
messages.messageBody:
This comic was created by Jason Holm, a homeschooling dad, who's trying to start up a new business to support his family.



IMPORTANT NOTICE!


Due to numerous requests, I will be making this comic available for t-shirts and bumper stickers. If you are interested, please drop me a line and let me know the sizes and quantity you would like. There's no obligation for this pre-order ï¿½ it just gives me a chance to check with the printer on how much it will cost to produce them. I'll probably start with a black and white image on the front of a white t-shirt, as well as black and white bumper stickers. Let me know if you'd be willing to pay extra for a color shirt, or a different design than this, and that will help me decide what to order!


More comics coming soon!

http://www.inflatablestudios.com/ to see the color version of comic
